metadata.name: No.1
metadata.description:
This is the start of my collection of numbers.
Also it is the start of my journey in creating NFTs.
As an old school graffiti artist I am now entering
the NFT space.
For me this is a new medium painting digitally. 
This painting is about me transforming my artistic skills into digital creations. 
Here I am playing around with what I love which is sharp lines and colorful shades.
